title: 2018–19 Denmark Series
text:
The 2018–19 Denmark Series was the 54th season of the <a href="Denmark%20Series">Denmark Series</a> which is a Danish football competition featuring amateur clubs. It is the fourth tier of the <a href="Football%20in%20Denmark">Danish football league system</a>. The competition is divided in four groups of ten teams each, based on geographical location. The winner of each group will be promoted to the <a href="2019%E2%80%9320%20Danish%202nd%20Divisions">2019–20 Danish 2nd Divisions</a>. Relegation from the Denmark Series is wholly dependent on clubs relegating from the <a href="Danish%202nd%20Division">Danish 2nd Division</a>; again, based on their geographical location. 
Because four clubs from west of the <a href="Great%20Belt">Great Belt</a> relegated from the <a href="2018%E2%80%9319%20Danish%202nd%20Divisions">2018–19 Danish 2nd Divisions</a>, and no teams east of the Great Belt, the 8th, 9th and 10th places of the West Groups (3 & 4) faced direct relegation to the lower tiers. The two 7th places in the East Groups (1 & 2) therefore face each other in direct play-off match for a place in the Denmark Series on a neutral ground. The overall winner remains in the Denmark Series.
East Groups.
No clubs from the East Groups relegated directly to the lower tiers, as four clubs west of the <a href="Great%20Belt">Great Belt</a> relegated from the <a href="2018%E2%80%9319%20Danish%202nd%20Divisions">2018–19 Danish 2nd Divisions</a> (<a href="Odder%20IGF">Odder IGF</a>, <a href="Tarup-Paarup%20IF">Tarup-Paarup IF</a>, <a href="Kjellerup%20IF">Kjellerup IF</a> and <a href="BK%20Marienlyst">BK Marienlyst</a>). <a href="Kastrup%20Boldklub">Kastrup Boldklub</a> became to only East Group club to relegate after a 3–0 loss to <a href="Taastrup%20FC">Taastrup FC</a> in a direct play-off match for a place in the <a href="2019%E2%80%9320%20Denmark%20Series">2019–20 Denmark Series</a>. 
<a href="TFC%20Odsherred">TFC Odsherred</a> disbanded following the season, saving <a href="Kastrup%20Boldklub">Kastrup Boldklub</a> from direct relegation.

West Groups.
Six clubs relegated directly from the Denmark Series from the West Groups, as four clubs west of the <a href="Great%20Belt">Great Belt</a> relegated from the <a href="2018%E2%80%9319%20Danish%202nd%20Divisions">2018–19 Danish 2nd Divisions</a> (<a href="Odder%20IGF">Odder IGF</a>, <a href="Tarup-Paarup%20IF">Tarup-Paarup IF</a>, <a href="Kjellerup%20IF">Kjellerup IF</a> and <a href="BK%20Marienlyst">BK Marienlyst</a>).
Group 3.
<onlyinclude></onlyinclude>
Group 4.
<onlyinclude></onlyinclude>
Relegation play-offs.
There was no playoff match in the West Groups (Groups 3 & 4) because <a href="Skovshoved%20IF">Skovshoved IF</a> (east of the Great Belt) survived in the <a href="Danish%202nd%20Division">Danish 2nd Division</a> and four west clubs relegated from the Danish 2nd Division.
East Region.
The East Region (Groups 1 & 2) relegation play-off was played on 23 June 2019 at the <a href="Glostrup%20Stadion">Glostrup Stadion</a>. The "home" team (for administrative purposes) was <a href="Taastrup%20FC">Taastrup FC</a>.
